queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=minio-tenant-role.rules.verbs should not contain the value 'create' when metadata.name=minio-tenant-role.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=minio-tenant-role.rules.verbs contains the value 'create' and metadata.name=minio-tenant-role.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{minio-tenant-role}}.rules[4] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{minio-tenant-role}}.rules[4] is granted read access (verbs: get, watch, create, update, list, delete, deletecollection) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{minio-tenant-role}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "watch", "create", "update", "list", "delete", "deletecollection"]]
